queryOptions
queryOptions
Option Type Description
limit integer Client side maximum number of documents to return
batchSize integer The number of documents to return per batch
queryFlags integer One or more of the query flags to use
skip integer The number of documents to skip before returning
sort array|object The order in which to return matching documents
modifiers array Meta-operators modifying the output or behavior of a query
projection array|object Limits the fields to return for all matching documents
